description: Try our easy to follow Eggnog Cheesecake With Fruit Compote recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Eggnog Cheesecake With Fruit Compote Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line the base of a 22cm springform tin with baking paper. Break biscuits into a food processor and add sugar. Process until fine crumbs. Add butter and process until combined. Press biscuit mixture over base and side of prepared tin. Chill while you prepare filling.

Process cream cheese, condensed milk and lemon juice in processor until smooth. Add bourbon and rum and process until combined. Fold in cream. Pour into crust and smooth surface. Chill for 6 hours or overnight.
Transfer cheesecake to a serving plate. Top with fruit compote, to serve.
